MR. SHUBHAM PANDITRAO BHARTI
Summary
 As a fresher with an MBA in Marketing and a background in agriculture, 
I bring hands-on experience as a Sales & Marketing Intern with 
strengths in Relationship Building, Negotiation, Excel, and Active 
Listening. I am certified in Dale Carnegie Sales Training, Digital 
Marketing, and Market Research, and have demonstrated leadership 
potential through active involvement in extracurricular activities. I am 
eager to leverage my knowledge and skills to drive innovation and 
growth in a dynamic corporate environment.
Experience
Sales & Marketing Intern
Jun-2024 - Aug-2024
Amul , Pune
As A Sales and marketing intern i were tasked to sale and Promote organic and 
bakery product of Amul. Market anaylsis on Compeititon of amul bakery and oganic 
product 
 - Conducted market research and analysis to identify potential customers and target 
markets for Amul dairy 
I Sold bakery and Organic products totaling Rs.7000 to the customer. I took orders 
and negotiated deals with the retail outlets.
